Once in a quiet village, there was a peculiar puddle that never dried up, regardless of the season. Villagers believed it held magical properties. Children splashed joyfully, while elders whispered tales of a lost treasure beneath its surface. One day, a curious girl named Elara decided to investigate. Armed with a small net, she dipped it into the shimmering water. To her surprise, she pulled out an ancient locket that glowed with warmth. It belonged to a long-forgotten queen who had once ruled the land. Elara returned it to the village, and the puddle transformed into a fountain, blessing the villagers with prosperity.
